message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase your product. I would like to propose a price of $95 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm still looking for a price that better reflects its value. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $105.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $100 for the product.
Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $100. I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $108.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product and am willing to pay $107 for it.
Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $107. I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $109.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I am willing to pay $108 for it.
